EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Austin SI Replatforming
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Days - Austin - Feb. 23rd, 2017 | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in Austin, TX!
We look forward to hosting you at our partner event. Your event confirmation details can be found below:
What: Pivotal Partner Days: Application Replatforming Workshop When: Thursday, February 23, 2017 Where: VMware, 3900 N Capital of Texas Hwy, Suite 500, Austin, TX 78746
The event will begin promptly at 11:00am. Please arrive 15 minutes early to sign in.
Remember to bring your laptops!
If you have any questions please contact Cameron Stewart (cstewart@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cstewart@pivotal.io]]>) or Andrew Mackenzie (amackenzie@pivotal.io <[[mailto:amackenzie@pivotal.io]]>).
Thanks and we look forward to seeing you in Austin!
- Pivotal Partner Alliances Team
